movies.Title: RRR
movies.Plot: A fearless warrior on a perilous mission comes face to face with a steely cop serving British forces in this epic saga set in pre-independent India.
movies.Actors: N.T. Rama Rao Jr., Ram Charan, Alia Bhatt

movies.Title: Inception
movies.Plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
movies.Actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page
